title: Conte's Complaining Continues
description:
The FC crew react to Antonio Conte doubling down on his thoughts on Tottenham's disallowed goal in the Champions League and question as to why the manager is still hung up on the disallowed goal. Plus, the guys react to Antony saying he won't change they way he plays and give out their predictions for the upcoming World Cup.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Antonio Conte won't let Spurs disallowed goal go; Antony says he won't change they way he plays after spin controversy; 2022 FIFA World Cup Predictions
